title: Real Madrid Plotting A Move For Another Spurs Star

organizations.name: real madrid plotting a move for another spurs star real madrid plotting a move for another spurs star mon feb

text:
Real Madrid Plotting A Move For Another Spurs Star Mon Feb 06 2017 23:07:33 GMT+0000 (GMT) Mon Feb 06 2017 23:07:33 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
It's no secret that Real Madrid are hellbent on snapping up a goalkeeper having expressed an interest in both David De Gea and Thibaut Courtois. 
But it appears Zinedine Zidane is targeting another Premier League stopper. Enter Hugo Lloris. According to The Telegraph , the Spurs keeper is on Real's shortlist for a new No.1. 
The reigning Champions League winners are eager to fill a world-class keeper between the sticks once their transfer ban ends in the summer. 
In spite of the Frenchman only putting pen-to-paper on a new deal in December which keeps him at the club till 2022. 
But will Lloris reject Zizou's advances? The report also suggest that Lloris would be an easier acquisition than the two previous names. Do you agree? 
Chelsea's main man in goal has come under intense transfer speculation about his future following the interest shown by Real. Though a move away is in the balance as the Spanish giants monitor an alternative. 
As well as working under the French legend, Real would also be prepared to double Lloris' Â£100,000-a-week wage to take him to the iconic Bernabeu. 
This news comes after the Los Blancos are reportedly keeping tabs on Dele Alli. Will either men leave for the Spanish capital? Sponsored Links
